name: CrediCor
description: Effect: After you pay for a card or standard project with a basic cost of 20 M€ or more, you gain 4 M€. You start with 57 M€.

name: Ecoline
description: Effect: You may always pay 7 plants, instead of 8, to place 1 greenery. You start with 2 plant production, 3 plants, and 36 M€.

name: Helion
description: Effect: You may use heat as M€. You may not use M€ as heat. You start with 3 heat production and 42 M€.

name: Interplanetary Cinematics
description: Effect: Each time you play an event, you gain 2 M€. You start with 20 steel and 30 M€.

name: Inventrix
description: Effect: Your temperature, oxygen, and ocean requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case. As your first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 M€.

name: Mining Guild
description: Effect: Each time you place a tile on an area with steel or titanium placement bonus, increase your steel production 1 step. You start with 30 M€, 5 steel, and 1 steel production.

name: PhoboLog
description: Effect: Your titanium resources are each worth 1 M€ extra. You start with 10 titanium and 23 M€.

name: Tharsis Republic
description: Effect: When any city tile is placed ON MARS, increase your M€ production 1 step. When you place a city tile, gain 3 M€. You start with 40 M€. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.

name: ThorGate
description: Effect: When playing a power card OR THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, you pay 3 M€ less for it. You start with 1 energy production and 48 M€.

name: United Nations Mars Initiative
description: Action: If your Terraform Rating was raised this generation, you may pay 3 M€ to raise it 1 step more. You start with 40 M€.

name: Saturn Systems
description: Effect: Each time any Jovian tag is put into play, including this, increase your M€ production 1 step. You start with 1 titanium production and 42 M€.

name: Teractor
description: Effect: When playing an Earth card, you pay 3 M€ less for it. You start with 60 M€.

name: Aphrodite
description: Effect: Whenever Venus is terraformed 1 step, you gain 2 M€. You start with 47 M€ and 1 plant production.

name: Celestic
description: Action: Add a floater to ANY card. You start with 42 M€. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 cards with a floater icon on it. Take those 2 cards into hand, and discard the rest. 1 VP per 3 floaters on this card.

name: Manutech
description: Effect: For each step you increase the production of a resource, including this, you also gain that resource. You start with 1 steel production and 35 M€.

name: Morning Star Inc.
description: Effect: Your Venus requirements are +/- 2 steps, your choice in each case. You start with 50 M€. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 3 Venus-tag cards. Take those into hand and discard the rest.

name: Viron
description: Action: Use a blue card action that has already been used this generation. You start with 48 M€.

name: Cheung Shing Mars
description: Effect: When you play a building tag, you pay 2 M€ less for it. You start with 44 M€ and 3 M€ production.

name: Point Luna
description: Effect: When you play a Earth tag, including this, draw a card. You start with 38 M€ and 1 titanium production.

name: Robinson Industries
description: Action: Spend 4 M€ to increase (one of) your LOWEST PRODUCTION 1 step. You start with 47 M€.

name: Valley Trust
description: Effect: When you play a science tag, you pay 2 M€ less for it. You start with 37 M€. As your first action, draw 3 Prelude cards, and play one of them. Discard the other two.

name: Vitor
description: Effect: When you play a card with a NON-NEGATIVE VP icon, including this, gain 3 M€. You start with 45 M€. As your first action, fund an award for free.

name: Aridor
description: Effect: When you get a new type of tag in play (event cards do not count), increase your M€ production 1 step. You start with 40 M€. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play.

name: Arklight
description: Effect: When you play an animal or plant tag, including this, add 1 animal to this card. You start with 45 M€. Increase your M€ production 2 steps. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Polyphemos
description: Effect: When you buy a card to hand, pay 5 M€ instead of 3 M€, including the starting hand. You start with 50 M€. Increase your M€ production 5 steps. Gain 5 titanium.

name: Poseidon
description: Effect: When any colony is placed, including this, raise your M€ production 1 step. You start with 45 M€. As your first action, place a colony.

name: Stormcraft Incorporated
description: Action: Add 1 floater to ANY card. / Effect: Floaters on this card may be used as 2 heat each. You start with 48 M€.

name: Lakefront Resorts
description: Effect: When any ocean is placed, increase your M€ production 1 step. / Your bonus for placing adjacent to oceans is 3 M€ instead of 2 M€. You start with 54 M€.

name: Pristar
description: Effect: During production phase, if you did not get TR so far this generation, add 1 preservation resource here and gain 6 M€. You start with 53 M€. Decrease your TR 2 steps. 1 VP per preservation resource here.

name: Septem Tribus
description: Action: Gain 2 M€ for EACH PARTY WHERE YOU HAVE AT LEAST 1 DELEGATE. You start with 36 M€. When you perform an action, the wild tag counts as any tag of your choice.

name: TerraLabs Research
description: Effect: Buying cards to hand costs 1 M€, including your starting hand. You start with 14 M€. Lower your TR 1 step.

name: Utopia Invest
description: Action: Decrease any production to gain 4 resources of that kind. You start with 40 M€. Increase your steel and titanium production 1 step each.

name: Arcadian Communities
description: Action: PLACE A COMMUNITY (PLAYER MARKER) ON A NON-RESERVED AREA ADJACENT TO ONE OF YOUR TILES OR MARKED AREAS. / Effect: MARKED AREAS ARE RESERVED FOR YOU. WHEN YOU PLACE A TILE THERE, GAIN 3 M€. You start with 40 M€ and 10 steel. AS YOUR FIRST ACTION, PLACE A COMMUNITY (PLAYER MARKER) ON A NON-RESERVED AREA.

name: Recyclon
description: Effect: When you play a building tag, including this, gain 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes here and raise your plant production 1 step. You start with 38 M€ and 1 steel production.

name: Splice Tactical Genomics
description: Effect: Each time a microbe tag is played, including this, THAT PLAYER gains 2 M€, or adds a microbe to THAT card, and you gain 2 M€. You start with 44 M€. As your first action, reveal cards until you have revealed a microbe tag. Take that card into hand, and discard the rest.

name: Factorum
description: Action: Increase your energy production 1 step IF YOU HAVE NO ENERGY RESOURCES, or spend 3 M€ to draw a building card. You start with 37 M€. Increase your steel production 1 step.

name: Mons Insurance
description: Effect: When a player causes another player to decrease production or lose resources, pay 3 M€ to the victim, or as much as possible. You start with 48 M€. Increase your M€ production 4 steps. ALL OPPONENTS DECREASE THEIR M€ PRODUCTION 2 STEPS. THIS DOES NOT TRIGGER THE EFFECT BELOW.

name: Philares
description: Effect: Each new adjacency between your tile and an opponent's tile gives you a standard resource of your choice (regardless of who just placed a tile). You start with 47 M€. As your first action, place a greenery tile and raise the oxygen 1 step.

name: AstroDrill
description: Action: Either add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD or gain any standard resource, OR spend 1 asteroid here to gain 3 titanium. You start with 35 M€, and 3 asteroid resources here.

name: Pharmacy Union
description: Effect: When ANY microbe tag is played, including these 2, add a disease here and lose 4 M€ or as much as possible. When you play a science tag, remove 1 disease from here and raise your TR 1 step, OR, if there are no diseases here, you may raise your TR 3 steps and place this card in your event pile. It now counts as a played event. You start with 54 M€. Draw a science card.

name: Allied Bank
description: Increase your M€ production 4 steps. Gain 3 M€.

name: Aquifer Turbines
description: Place an ocean tile. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Remove 3 M€.

name: Biofuels
description: Increase your plant production and energy production 1 step each. Gain 2 plants.

name: Biolab
description: Increase your plant production 1 step. Draw 3 cards.

name: Biosphere Support
description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Business Empire
description: Increase your M€ production 6 steps. Remove 6 M€.

name: Dome Farming
description: Increase your plant production 1 step. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: Donation
description: Gain 21 M€.

name: Early Settlement
description: Place a city tile. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Ecology Experts
description: Increase your plant production 1 step. PLAY A CARD FROM HAND, IGNORING GLOBAL REQUIREMENTS

name: Excentric Sponsor
description: PLAY A CARD FROM HAND, REDUCING ITS COST BY 25 M€

name: Experimental Forest
description: Place a greenery tile and increase oxygen 1 step. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 plant-tag cards. Take these into your hand, and discard the rest.

name: Galilean Mining
description: Increase your titanium production 2 steps. Remove 5 M€.

name: Great Aquifer
description: Place 2 ocean tiles.

name: Huge Asteroid
description: Raise temperature 3 steps. Remove 5 M€.

name: Io Research Outpost
description: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Draw 1 card.

name: Loan
description: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps. Gain 30 M€.

name: Martian Industries
description: Increase your energy production and steel production 1 step each. Gain 6 M€.

name: Metal-Rich Asteroid
description: Raise temperature 1 step. Gain 4 titanium, and 4 steel.

name: Metals Company
description: Increase your M€ production, steel production, and titanium production 1 step each.

name: Mining Operations
description: Increase your steel production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.

name: Mohole
description: Increse your heat production 3 steps. Gain 3 heat.

name: Mohole Excavation
description: Increase your steel production 1 step, and your heat production 2 steps. Gain 2 heat.

name: Nitrogen Shipment
description: Raise your terraform rating 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 5 M€.

name: Orbital Construction Yard
description: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Gain 4 titanium.

name: Polar Industries
description: Place 1 ocean tile. Increase your heat production 2 steps.

name: Power Generation
description: Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Research Network
description: Draw 3 cards, and increase your M€ production 1 step. After being played, when you perform an action, the wild tag is any tag of your choice.

name: Self-Sufficient Settlement
description: Place a city tile. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: Smelting Plant
description: Raise oxygen 2 steps. Gain 5 steel.

name: Society Support
description: Decrease your M€ production  1 step. Increase your plant production, energy production, and heat production 1 step each.

name: Supplier
description: Increase your energy production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.

name: Supply Drop
description: Gain 3 titanium, 8 steeel, and 3 plants.

name: UNMI Contractor
description: Raise your terraform rating 3 steps. Draw 1 card.

name: Acquired Space Agency
description: Gain 6 titanium. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 space cards. Take those into hand, and discard the rest.

name: Colonizer Training Camp
description: Oxygen must be 5% or less.

name: Deep Well Heating
description: Increase your energy production 1 step. Increase temperature 1 step.

name: Cloud Seeding
description: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Decrease your M€ production 1 step and any heat production 1 step.  Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Search For Life
description: Action: Spend 1 M€ to reveal and discard the top card of the draw deck. If that card has a microbe tag, add a science resource here. Oxygen must be 6% or less. 3 VPs if you have one or more science resources here.

name: Martian Rails
description: Action: Spend 1 energy to gain 1 M€ for each city tile ON MARS.

name: Capital
description: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Place this tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your M€ production 5 steps. 1 ADDITIONAL VP FOR EACH OCEAN TILE ADJACENT TO THIS CITY TILE.

name: Asteroid
description: Raise temperature 1 step and gain 2 titanium. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

name: Comet
description: Raise temperature 1 step and place an ocean tile. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

name: Big Asteroid
description: Raise temperature 2 steps and gain 4 titanium. Remove up to 4 plants from any player.

name: Water Import From Europa
description: Action: Pay 12 M€ to place an ocean tile. TITANIUM MAY BE USED as if playing a space card. 1 VP for each Jovian tag you have.

name: Equatorial Magnetizer
description: Action: Decrease your energy production 1 step to increase your terraform rating 1 step.

name: Domed Crater
description: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 3 plants and place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase M€ production 3 steps.

name: Noctis City
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA, disregarding normal placement restrictions.

name: Methane From Titan
description: Requires 2% oxygen. Increase your heat production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps.

name: Imported Hydrogen
description: Gain 3 plants, or add 3 microbes or 2 animals to ANOTHER card. Place an ocean tile.

name: Research Outpost
description: Effect: When you play a card, you pay 1 M€ less for it. Place a city tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE.

name: Phobos Space Haven
description: Increase your titanium production 1 step and place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA.

name: Black Polar Dust
description: Place an ocean tile. Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your heat production 3 steps.

name: Arctic Algae
description: Effect: When anyone places an ocean tile, gain 2 plants. It must be -12°C or colder to play. Gain 1 plant.

name: Predators
description: Action: Remove 1 animal from any card and add it to this card. Requires 11% oxygen. 1 VP per animal on this card.

name: Eos Chasma National Park
description: Requires -12°C  or warmer. Add 1 animal TO ANY ANIMAL CARD. Gain 3 plants. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: Cupola City
description: Oxygen must be 9% or less. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps.

name: Lunar Beam
description: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your heat production and energy production 2 steps each.

name: Optimal Aerobraking
description: Effect: When you place a space event, you gain 3 M€ and 3 heat.

name: Underground City
description: Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your steel production 2 steps.

name: Regolith Eaters
description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes from this card to raise oxygen level 1 step.

name: GHG Producing Bacteria
description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes to raise temperature 1 step. Requires 4% oxygen.

name: Ants
description: Action: Remove 1 microbe from any card to add 1 to this card. Requires 4% oxygen. 1 VP per 2 microbes on this card.

name: Release Of Inert Gases
description: Raise your terraform rating 2 steps.

name: Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid
description: Raise your terraform rating 2 steps and temperature 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step, or 4 steps if you have 3 plant tags.

name: Rover Construction
description: Effect: When any city tile is placed, gain 2 M€.

name: Deimos Down
description: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Remove up to 8 plants from any player.

name: Asteroid Mining
description: Increase your titanium production 2 steps.

name: Food Factory
description: Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps.

name: Archaebacteria
description: It must be -18°C or colder. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Carbonate Processing
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 3 steps.

name: Natural Preserve
description: Oxygen must be 4% or less. Place this tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE. Increase your M€ production 1 step.

name: Nuclear Power
description: Decrease your M€ production 2 steps and increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Algae
description: Requires 5 ocean tiles. Gain 1 plant and increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Adapted Lichen
description: Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Fish
description: Action: Add 1 animal to this card. Requires 2°C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

name: Lake Marineris
description: Requires 0°C or warmer. Place 2 ocean tiles.

name: Small Animals
description: Action: Add 1 animal to this card. Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Kelp Farming
description: Requires 6 ocean tiles. Increase your M€ production 2 steps and your plant production 3 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Beam From A Thorium Asteroid
description: Requires a Jovian tag. Increase your heat production and energy production 3 steps each.

name: Mangrove
description: Requires +4°C or warmer. Place a Greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN and raise oxygen 1 step. Disregard normal placement restrictions for this.

name: Trees
description: Requires -4°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 3 steps. Gain 1 plant.

name: Mining Expedition
description: Raise oxygen 1 step. Remove 2 plants from any player. Gain 2 steel.

name: Mining Rights
description: Place this tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus. Increase that production 1 step.

name: Birds
description: Action: Add an animal to this card. Requires 13% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 2 steps. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

name: Towing A Comet
description: Gain 2 plants. Raise oxygen level 1 step and place an ocean tile.

name: Space Mirrors
description: Action: Spend 7 M€ to increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Solar Wind Power
description: Increase your energy production 1 step and gain 2 titanium.

name: Ice Asteroid
description: Place 2 ocean tiles.

name: Giant Ice Asteroid
description: Raise temperature 2 steps and place 2 ocean tiles. Remove up to 6 plants from any player.

name: Ganymede Colony
description: Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA. 1 VP per Jovian tag you have.

name: Giant Space Mirror
description: Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Grass
description: Requires -16°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 3 plants.

name: Heather
description: Requires -14°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant.

name: Peroxide Power
description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Bushes
description: Requires -10°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Greenhouses
description: Gain 1 plant for each city tile in play.

name: Nuclear Zone
description: Place this tile and raise temperature 2 steps.

name: Fueled Generators
description: Decrease your M€ production 1 step and increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Ironworks
description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 steel and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Power Grid
description: Increase your energy production 1 step for each power tag you have, including this.)

name: Steelworks
description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 2 steel and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Ore Processor
description: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 titanium and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Open City
description: Requires 12% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 4 steps. Gain 2 plants and place a city tile.

name: Solar Power
description: Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Breathing Filters
description: Requires 7% oxygen.

name: Artificial Photosynthesis
description: Increase your plant production 1 step or your energy production 2 steps.

name: Artificial Lake
description: Requires -6°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile ON AN AREA NOT RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

name: Geothermal Power
description: Increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Farming
description: Requires +4°C or warmer. Increase your M€ production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Dust Seals
description: Requires 3 or less ocean tiles.

name: Urbanized Area
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place a city tile ADJACENT TO AT LEAST 2 OTHER CITY TILES.

name: Moss
description: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 1 plant. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: GHG Factories
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 4 steps.

name: Subterranean Reservoir
description: Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Ecological Zone
description: Effect: When you play an animal or a plant tag (including these 2), add an animal to this card. Requires that you have a greenery tile. Place this tile ADJACENT TO ANY GREENERY TILE. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Zeppelins
description: Requires 5% oxygen. Increase your M€ production 1 step for each city tile ON MARS.

name: Worms
description: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for every 2 microbe tags you have, including this.

name: Decomposers
description: Effect: When you play an animal, plant, or microbe tag, including this, add a microbe to this card. Requires 3% oxygen. 1 VP per 3 microbes on this card.

name: Fusion Power
description: Requires 2 power tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Symbiotic Fungus
description: Action: Add a microbe to ANOTHER card. Requires -14°C or warmer.

name: Extreme-Cold Fungus
description: Action: Gain 1 plant or add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card. It must be -10°C or colder.

name: Advanced Ecosystems
description: Requires a plant tag, a microbe tag, and an animal tag.

name: Great Dam
description: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Strip Mine
description: Decrease your energy production 2 steps. Increase your steel production 2 steps and your titanium production 1 step. Raise oxygen 2 steps.

name: Wave Power
description: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Lava Flows
description: Raise temperature 2 steps and place this tile ON EITHER THARSIS THOLUS, ASCRAEUS MONS, PAVONIS MONS OR ARSIA MONS.

name: Power Plant
description: Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Mohole Area
description: Increase your heat production 4 steps. Place this tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

name: Large Convoy
description: Place an ocean tile and draw 2 cards. Gain 5 plants, or add 4 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Tectonic Stress Power
description: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Nitrophilic Moss
description: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 2 plants. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Herbivores
description: Effect: When you place a greenery tile, add an animal to this card. Requires 8% oxygen. Add 1 animal to this card. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Insects
description: Requires 6% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for each plant tag you have.

name: Insulation
description: Decrease your heat production any number of steps and increase your M€ production the same number of steps.

name: Adaptation Technology
description: Effect: Your global requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.

name: Designed Microorganisms
description: It must be -14°C or colder. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Nitrite Reducing Bacteria
description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 3 microbes to increase your TR 1 step. Add 3 microbes to this card.

name: Industrial Microbes
description: Increase your energy production and your steel production 1 step each.

name: Lichen
description: Requires -24°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Convoy From Europa
description: Place 1 ocean tile and draw 1 card.

name: Imported GHG
description: Increase your heat production 1 step and gain 3 heat.

name: Imported Nitrogen
description: Raise your TR 1 step and gain 4 plants. Add 3 microbes to ANOTHER card and 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Micro-Mills
description: Increase your heat production 1 step.

name: Magnetic Field Generators
description: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps.

name: Shuttles
description: Effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 M€ less for it. Requires 5% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: Import Of Advanced GHG
description: Increase your heat production 2 steps.

name: Windmills
description: Requires 7% oxygen. Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Tundra Farming
description: Requires -6°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step and your M€ production 2 steps. Gain 1 plant.

name: Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid
description: Add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card. Increase your heat production 3 steps and your plant production 1 step.

name: Magnetic Field Dome
description: Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your plant production 1 step. Raise your terraform rating 1 step.

name: Pets
description: Effect: When any city tile is placed, add an animal to this card. ANIMALS MAY NOT BE REMOVED FROM THIS CARD Add 1 animal to this card. 1 VP per 2 animals here.

name: Protected Valley
description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN, disregarding normal placement restrictions, and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Noctis Farming
description: Requires -20°C or warmer. Increase your M€ production 1 step and gain 2 plants.

name: Water Splitting Plant
description: Action: Spend 3 energy to raise oxygen 1 step. Requires 2 ocean tiles.

name: Heat Trappers
description: Decrease any heat production 2 steps and increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Soil Factory
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Ice Cap Melting
description: Requires +2°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Biomass Combustors
description: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Livestock
description: Action: Add 1 animal to this card. Requires 9% oxygen. Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your M€ production 2 steps. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

name: Aquifer Pumping
description: Action: Spend 8 M€ to place 1 ocean tile. STEEL MAY BE USED as if you were playing a building card.

name: Flooding
description: Place an ocean tile. IF THERE ARE TILES ADJACENT TO THIS OCEAN TILE, YOU MAY REMOVE 4 M€ FROM THE OWNER OF ONE OF THOSE TILES.

name: Energy Saving
description: Increase your energy production 1 step for each city tile in play.

name: Local Heat Trapping
description: Spend 5 heat to either gain 4 plants, or to add 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Permafrost Extraction
description: Requires -8°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Plantation
description: Requires 2 science tags. Place a greenery tile and raise oxygen 1 step.

name: Immigration Shuttles
description: Increase your M€ production 5 steps. 1 VP for every 3rd city in play.

name: Immigrant City
description: Effect: Each time a city tile is placed, including this, increase your M€ production 1 step. Decrease your energy production 1 step and decrease your M€ production 2 steps. Place a city tile.

name: Underground Detonations
description: Action: Spend 10 M€ to increase your heat production 2 steps.

name: Soletta
description: Increase your heat production 7 steps.

name: Rad-Chem Factory
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step. Raise your terraform rating 2 steps.

name: Special Design
description: The next card you play this generation is +2 or -2 in global requirements, your choice.

name: Asteroid Mining Consortium
description: Requires that you have titanium production. Decrease any titanium production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

name: Inventors' Guild
description: Action: LOOK AT THE TOP CARD AND EITHER BUY IT OR DISCARD IT

name: Space Elevator
description: Action: Spend 1 steel to gain 5 M€ Increase your titanium production 1 step.

name: Development Center
description: Action: Spend 1 energy to draw a card.

name: Space Station
description: Effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2 M€ less for it.

name: Interstellar Colony Ship
description: Requires 5 science tags.

name: Security Fleet
description: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 fighter resource to this card. 1 VP for each fighter resource on this card.

name: Lightning Harvest
description: Requires 3 science tags. Increase your energy production and your M€ production 1 step each.

name: Tardigrades
description: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card. 1 VP per 4 microbes on this card.

name: Virus
description: Remove up to 2 animals or 5 plants from any player.

name: Miranda Resort
description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for each Earth tag you have.

name: Mine
description: Increase your steel production 1 step.

name: Vesta Shipyard
description: Increase your titanium production 1 step.

name: Great Escarpment Consortium
description: Requires that you have steel production. Decrease any steel production 1 step and increase your own 1 step.

name: Mineral Deposit
description: Gain 5 steel.

name: Mining Area
description: Place this tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus, adjacent to another of your tiles. Increase your production of that resource 1 step.

name: Building Industries
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your steel production 2 steps.

name: Land Claim
description: PLACE YOUR MARKER ON A NON-RESERVED AREA. ONLY YOU MAY PLACE A TILE HERE

name: Sponsors
description: Increase your M€ production 2  steps.

name: Electro Catapult
description: Action: Spend 1 plant or 1 steel to gain 7 M€. Oxygen must be 8% or less. Decrease your energy production 1 step.
